title: Misfit McCabe
description: When Katie McCabe accidentally burns down a neighbor's shed, she thinks it's the worst thing that could happen. Boy is she ever wrong. Hustled off to live with her Uncle Charley, Katie struggles with the changes in her life. The only bright spot is making a friend who wants to be more. But the first person she meets is an enemy with ties to her past who believes in dangerous retribution. How far is he willing to go? Katie wonders if she has the strength to survive.
author: L.K. Gardner-Griffie
